INVALID_FILE_SIZE: The image base64 string must not be empty or larger than 2MB
INVALID_NUMBER_OF_FACE: Invalid number of faces in image index = {}. Number of face = {}.
INVALID_IMAGE_TYPE: Make sure the image is in the correct format. Support .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .webp
INVALID_FACESET_NAME: Invalid faceset_name: {}. Maximum 256 characters, only alphabet, number, - and _ are allowed
BAD_QUALITY: Image contains bad quality face (containing side/rotated face)
INVALID_USER_ID: Invalid user_id: {}. Maximum 256 characters, only alphabet, number, - and _ are allowed
SOURCE_URL_EXISTED: Source url exited: {}, please stop source using RemoveSource and try again
CANNOT_READ_STREAM: Cannot read stream, please check connection and ensure that stream is running
INVALID_TIMESTAMP: Invalid StartTime/EndTime, please make sure EndTime > StartTime, EndTime < now, StartTime < now
MISSING_ARGUMENTS: Some arguments are missing from the inputs, please recheck inputs
